gov.nasa.worldwind.util
Interface HotSpot

All Superinterfaces:
EventListener, KeyListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener, SelectListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractBrowserBalloon, AbstractHotSpot, AbstractResizeHotSpot, BalloonResizeController, DragControl, FrameResizeControl, GlobeBrowserBalloon, ScreenBrowserBalloon, ScrollBar.ScrollControl, ScrollBar.ScrollKnob, ScrollFrame, TreeHotSpot
public interface HotSpot
extends SelectListener, KeyListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener

HotSpot is an interface for forwarding select, keyboard, and mouse events to picked objects in the WorldWindow. When the HotSpot is active it receives input events that occur in the WorldWindow.

Method Summary
 Cursor getCursor()
          Returns the AWT Cursor representation to display when the HotSpot is active, or null to use the default Cursor.

          Indicates whether or not this HotSpot is active.

          Called when the mouse is clicked on the HotSpot in the World Window.

          Called when the mouse is released over the HotSpot in the World Window.
 void mouseWheelMoved(MouseWheelEvent event)
          Called when the mouse wheel is moved in the World Window and HotSpot is active.

          Called when the HotSpot is selected in the World Window.
 void setActive(boolean active)
          Called when this HotSpot is activated or deactivated.
 

Method Detail

getCursor

Cursor getCursor()
Returns the AWT Cursor representation to display when the HotSpot is active, or null to use the default Cursor.

Returns:
The Cursor representation associated with the HotSpot. May return null.

isActive

boolean isActive()
Indicates whether or not this HotSpot is active.

Returns:
true if this HotSpot is active, false if not.

setActive

void setActive(boolean active)
Called when this HotSpot is activated or deactivated. The HotSpot only receives input events when it is active.

Parameters:
active - true if this HotSpot is being activated. false if this HotSpot is being deactivated.
